title: Rythmetic
creator_credit: Evelyn Lambart, Norman McLaren and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: An animated film by Norman McLaren and Evelyn Lambart which endows arithmetic with lively humour. The screen becomes a numerical free-for-all as digits meet in playful encounter, add and subtract, jostle, attack, elude one another. (Ten awards: including Edinburgh, British Film Academy)
